response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 5
response.overview: A total of 10 episodes of horror footage that will freeze your spine!! [Zoo] A zoo visited by lovers. My boyfriend noticed something strange when he was looking at animals. It happened when I climbed the hill. In addition to the magnificent scenery, a strange sight was reflected [Suicide Bridge] A bridge where suicides frequently occur. It is said to be a suicide bridge in the neighborhood. A total of 10 episodes of terrifying footage that cannot be seen by one person, such as the contributor's strange things happening while shooting fireworks with his friends, are recorded.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 5
